task.summary: Default task
change the readme file to show more enthusiasm :-)
change the readme file to show more enthusiasm :-)
adding a license file
clean up of todo
Delete "System" from the empty website

On a comment from Tom Junkapiller: "The 'Dynamic' asset loader isn't jailed to the defined data directory, so it can and will serve any file on the system under a number of circumstances".
Used path.join and normalise + check if afterwards the full filename path still begins with our dynamic data store.
Found wrong definition of Page.render, I don't think it is called (by Cody itself), I left it in there with some console error output
Change the render method of facebook share and like - content
the note field in the Atoms table was too small, we could even consider to change it to `text`, for now I've changed to varchar(4096)
fixed a bug in choosing the right Meta.reader function in case of a SelectBox. (reader = 'string', not 'multiple')
Updated SMTP mail sending code using nodemailer 1.x from 0.7. You can now have the complete SMTP option in the config (smtpoptions). [bumped the version number]
Increased the max size of the extention field in the atoms table. (some unix/linux/osx users frequently have .jpeg files)

Added tot possibility the send mails using collected data from forms (including the possibility to send a test mail first). Changed code.Controller to allow an extra "finished" function parameters, giving the choice of sending the mails after or before finishing the current web request.
small clean up's
Fixed error in nextRequest (which fixed the bug in Users - Save & Delete), removed the "leave password empty" message while creating a new user, bumped cody minor version number to 3.3.1.

Fixed a bug when creating a new Form. (ScrapeFrom in Atom returned an "undefined" extention and the FormController thought it was a form element instead of a form). Bumped version number, will do npm upgrade.

First alpha version of the upcoming contact manager/controller. Small additions to Model.js and fixes to SystemController (but it should actually be removed, this is more for the hosting package). Will bump version number with npm
now using a 'cody development directory' with in there: node_modules + all your sites + all your startup files (adapted empty and create site)
changed the readme in order to reflect the changes in 3.3.5
remove forgotten console.log
now also try to create /usr/local/data at install time.
Trying to get the SystemController in a usable shape...
focus in login.ejs, fixed error in content.render(type==params)

1) in create_site: quick fix for creating an empty "controllers" dir in new projects + 2) added "path.sep" when doing "path.split" in the startup script (as per suggestion of linksgo2011) + 3) typo in readme.md + 4) bumped version number
display http addresses for website and admin pages after create-site
add a dbport parameter to the config for using an alternate port number to the mysqld
internal redirects are called ".delegate" in Application AND Controller. External (through a browser redirect) are called ".redirect" also in both files.
Fixed layout problem when a custom form contained a field called "title"...
Added support for dates to getParam (default value should be instanceof Date)
makeWebApp is a second step to multi hosting / https / etc...
makeWebApp is a second step to multi hosting / https / etc...
better makeWebApp.js (deprecates startWebApp) + startServer for multi site hosting / https / certificates et al.
allow alternate config file in makeWebApp for development
fixed bug in "alternate config file" code

MESSAGE.value: the note field in the Atoms table was too small, we could even consider to change it to `text`, for now I've changed to varchar(4096)
fixed a bug in choosing the right Meta.reader function in case of a SelectBox. (reader = 'string', not 'multiple')
Updated SMTP mail sending code using nodemailer 1.x from 0.7. You can now have the complete SMTP option in the config (smtpoptions). [bumped the version number]
Increased the max size of the extention field in the atoms table. (some unix/linux/osx users frequently have .jpeg files)

Added tot possibility the send mails using collected data from forms (including the possibility to send a test mail first). Changed code.Controller to allow an extra "finished" function parameters, giving the choice of sending the mails after or before finishing the current web request.
small clean up's
Fixed error in nextRequest (which fixed the bug in Users - Save & Delete), removed the "leave password empty" message while creating a new user, bumped cody minor version number to 3.3.1.

Fixed a bug when creating a new Form. (ScrapeFrom in Atom returned an "undefined" extention and the FormController thought it was a form element instead of a form). Bumped version number, will do npm upgrade.

First alpha version of the upcoming contact manager/controller. Small additions to Model.js and fixes to SystemController (but it should actually be removed, this is more for the hosting package). Will bump version number with npm
now using a 'cody development directory' with in there: node_modules + all your sites + all your startup files (adapted empty and create site)
changed the readme in order to reflect the changes in 3.3.5
remove forgotten console.log
now also try to create /usr/local/data at install time.
Trying to get the SystemController in a usable shape...
focus in login.ejs, fixed error in content.render(type==params)

1) in create_site: quick fix for creating an empty "controllers" dir in new projects + 2) added "path.sep" when doing "path.split" in the startup script (as per suggestion of linksgo2011) + 3) typo in readme.md + 4) bumped version number
display http addresses for website and admin pages after create-site
add a dbport parameter to the config for using an alternate port number to the mysqld
internal redirects are called ".delegate" in Application AND Controller. External (through a browser redirect) are called ".redirect" also in both files.
Fixed layout problem when a custom form contained a field called "title"...
Added support for dates to getParam (default value should be instanceof Date)
makeWebApp is a second step to multi hosting / https / etc...
better makeWebApp.js (deprecates startWebApp) + startServer for multi site hosting / https / certificates et al.
allow alternate config file in makeWebApp for development
fixed bug in "alternate config file" code

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: fixed bug in "alternate config file" code
